munit-tools:assert-that.doc:name: Assert (tools has specific function) OR (response contains keyword)
munit-tools:assert-that.expression: #[((sizeOf((payload.payload.tools default []) filter (tool) -> tool.function != null) > 0) and (sizeOf((payload.payload.tools default []) filter (tool) -> (tool.function.name default "") == "update_user_profile") > 0)) or ((payload.payload.response default "") contains "update_user_profile")]
munit-tools:assert-that.message: The response must contain a tool with the 'update_user_profile' function or mention it in the response text.
